meanings.sent1: The monotheists gathered at the temple to pray together.
meanings.sent2: Many monotheists celebrate their faith by attending religious services regularly.
meanings.sent3: The monotheists joked that their god must have a sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: In a world of many gods, the monotheists stood out like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The monotheists' unwavering devotion to their god inspired others to seek faith.

meanings.definition: Those who worship a single deity.
meanings.sent1: Monotheists believe in the power of their single deity to guide them.
meanings.sent2: The monotheists' prayers were filled with gratitude for their one true god.
meanings.sent3: The monotheists playfully argued about whose single deity was the most powerful.
meanings.sent4: In a world of many gods, the monotheists' devotion to one stood out like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: The monotheists' unwavering faith in their single deity was unshakable.
